title: IAA Tonight | Why So Much Disrespect for Lamar Jackson?
description: An anonymous NFL coach had some harsh criticism for Ravens QB Lamar Jackson stating: 'He is just so inconsistent throwing the ball.' Well Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, and Leger Douzable think otherwise of the former MVP. Also, we preview the Jacksonville Jaguars 2022 season. Will Trevor Lawrence have a better second year in the league after having a rocky start to his career?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, Leger Douzable)
